mean_en: behaviour that people think is strange or unusual; the quality of being unusual and different from other people
sentence: My friend has the eccentricity of his eating habits.
sentence_trans: 朋友有着古怪的进食习惯。
sentence_phrase: the eccentricity of his eating habits
word_etyma: ec=ex出 + centr中心 + icity表名词 → eccentricity离心率
